item.title: By: Brandon Stafford
item.dc:creator: Brandon Stafford
item.description:
I've collected all of the different formats of the logo that I could find and given them a permanent home at http://oshwlogo.com/
More formats are always welcome; the details are on the website.
Brandon
item.content:encoded:
I’ve collected all of the different formats of the logo that I could find and given them a permanent home at http://oshwlogo.com/

More formats are always welcome; the details are on the website.

Brandon
